name: D. Little Girl and Maximum XOR
statement:
A little girl loves problems on bitwise operations very much. Here’s one
of them.You are given two integers and . Let’s consider the values of
for all pairs of integers and . Your task is to find the maximum value
among all considered ones.Expression means applying bitwise excluding or
operation to integers and . The given operation exists in all modern
programming languages, for example, in languages ++ and it is
represented as "", in as "".
